info.name: Billers Engine API Documentation
info.description:
## Overview

Billers Engine helps your business to do all financial needs through our API and dashboard features. you can build feature in your application to send money to your customers, accept payment from your customers, or automate financial process.

## API

Our API use HTTP request with only POST method and all the response use JSON format. Our Authentication use Token Based (Token will be destroy if user reset the password otherwise Token will active permanently). All request Header must have :

- `Content-Type: application/json`
    
- `Accept: application/json`
    

## Getting Started

You need to get URL, email & password to use our Billers Engine & Dashboard, you can get it from our team. for development only, our team will give you free balance for testing purposes

## FAQ

Q: How long the login token live?  
A: Token will live permanently, unless the credential(email/password) is reset or changed

---

Q: How to get credential email and password?  
A: You can get email and password from our team

---

Q: How to test in sandbox account?  
A: unfortunately we don't have sandbox right now, but you can request free balance for development, just contact our team for testing purposes

## Response Code(RC) List

rc: 99 => FAILED  
rc: 0 => SUCCESS  
rc: 91 => PENDING  
rc: 98 => Invalid Token

request.description:
your balance will be deduct based on `total` parameter in inquiry response.

| Type | Parameter | Value |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Mandatory | product_code | get from list product from our admin |
| Optional | amount | fill amount parameter with open denom/amount product like QRIS or VA |
| Optional | remark | remark will be send to customer (if the biller support) |
| Optional | client_reff | unique_id from client to reconcile transaction or validate transaction |
| Optional | expiry_time | default is 60 minutes |
| Optional | return_url | default will use the Cash In/Pay In callback inform to our admin |
| Optional | merchant_id | for QRIS transaction only |

your balance will be deduct based on `total` parameter in inquiry response.

| Type | Parameter | Value |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Mandatory | product_code | get from list product from our admin |
| Optional | amount | fill amount parameter with open denom/amount product like QRIS or VA |
| Optional | remark | remark will be send to customer (if the biller support) |
| Optional | client_reff | unique_id from client to reconcile transaction or validate transaction |
| Optional | expiry_time | default is 60 minutes |
| Optional | return_url | default will use the Cash In/Pay In callback inform to our admin |
| Optional | merchant_id | for QRIS transaction only |

your balance will be deduct based on `total` parameter in inquiry response.

| Type | Parameter | Value |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Optional | reff | unique_id from our side to reconcile transaction or validate transaction |
| Optional | client_reff | unique_id from client to reconcile transaction or validate transaction |

request.description:
your balance will be deduct based on `total` parameter in inquiry response.

| Type | Parameter | Value |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Mandatory | product_code | get from list product Endpoint |
| Mandatory | custno | destination number / bank account number / phone number |
| Optional | amount | fill amount parameter with open denom/amount product like E-Wallet/Disbursment |
| Optional | remark | remark will be send to customer (if the biller support) |
| Optional | client_reff | unique_id from client to reconcile transaction or validate transaction |

response.name: DANA Open - Success
response.body:
{
    "rc": 0,
    "message": "successfuly",
    "data": {

            "total_price": 21000
        },
        "raw": "Konfirmasi Transaksi||Produk  : DANA Open Denom||ID Pel  : 085939753687||Nama    : ||Ket     : ||Harga   : Rp 20.000||Admin   : Rp 1.000||Adm Trx : Rp 0||Total   : Rp 21.000||",
        "reff": "1752928400dFBXV4Z",
        "client_reff": "test-cmi-0064"
    }
}

request.description:
Your balance will deduct if the payment response is SUCCESS(rc:0) or PENDING(rc:91) based on `total` paramter in payment response. if you get PENDING(rc:91) response you need to wait the Callback for a valid status.

Callback will be send to your registered link with GET method in 1 - 2 second after doing Payment, you can validate callback with payment reff and update transaction status with SUCCESS(rc:0) or FAILED(rc:99). if the callback status FAILED(rc:99) we will refund your balance.

You can see list balance mutation in Billers Engine Dashboard

| Type | Parameter | Value |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Mandatory | reff | get from inquiry Endpoint |
| Optional | pin | fill if your activate this feature (if not just set to NULL) |

request.description:
to get history transaction and detail transaction status

| Type | Parameter | Value |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Mandatory | limit | total data will show (max:500) |
| Optional | start_date | if not set will set today |
| Optional | end_date | if not set NULL will set today |
| Optional | reff | if set will find only this reff |
